cause.description:
What is this i hear that it is 0.50 cents to use the payphone now what da fuck is up wit that?!
If anybody is not 18 by janurary 1st of 2008 u have to be 21 to go gamble at da casino or even get in the bars?!
I think not i really think we should actually go though with this fight for are rights not to get fucked up the ass an extra 0.25cents to be required to use the god damn payphone we are not the fucken UNITED STATES OF AMERICA people we are Fucken CANADA where 18+ will get u in da casinos will get u in da bars n yes will even get u da right 2 rent porn from ur loco stores we should think about that well really do u wanna pay .50 to use a payphone if u dont got a cellphone or do u wanna wait till 21+ if u aint over 18+ before JANUARY 1ST 2008
ACT NOW!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
1. To Reduse Payphone Prices
2. To Allow Canadians 18+ To Be Treated Like A Adult Not a Child
3. To Get The Point Across
cause.name: Civil Rights!! Act Now!!
